label: Vision & Mission
heading: Vision & Mission of the Department
description: To develop competent pharmacy professionals with ethical values, research aptitude, and commitment to healthcare excellence and community service.

sections.heading: Vision
items: To be a center of excellence in pharmaceutical education, producing skilled pharmacy professionals who contribute to healthcare advancement and societal well-being
To foster innovation, research, and entrepreneurship in pharmaceutical sciences
To create pharmacy graduates committed to ethical practices and patient-centric care

sections.heading: Mission of the Department
items: To provide quality pharmaceutical education aligned with industry standards and regulatory requirements
To develop competent pharmacy professionals with strong theoretical knowledge and practical skills
To promote research and innovation in pharmaceutical sciences
To instill ethical values, professional integrity, and social responsibility in students
To foster industry-academia collaboration for enhanced learning outcomes
To encourage entrepreneurship and self-employment opportunities in the pharmacy sector
To contribute to community health through awareness programs and pharmaceutical care services
